overview:
SocialClicks is a powerfully growing, self-funded, media technology company, specializing in cutting edge solutions for data-driven user acquisition on Facebook.

We power some of the top brand advertisers, as well as online game companies, app developers, and game publishers worldwide and we repeatedly deliver unbeatable performance results to our clients.

We run and analyze ad campaigns and tie our targeting to the actual in-game or Fan page performance. Using our technology, data mining, and massive BI analysis, we are able to identify and drive the most relevant, engaged, and monetizing users to your Facebook app, Fan page, landing page etc. We don’t just drive traffic; we help our clients to grow strong and lasting user and fan bases.

We are a Facebook Ads API certified partner, with proprietary technology built over this API. We currently offer our solutions in a fully managed performance based service (through various risk-free models of CPA/CPI/CPP/CPNU/CPF…), and we are working on sharing features of our internal powerful dynamic tracking and analytics tool as a ‘Self-serve’ SAAS product.

We have been fortunate to put together an amazing team of top notch computer engineers, mathematicians, serial entrepreneurs and ad analysts, all sharing endless passion for digital media and performance based advertising.

Don’t miss the chance to contact us and learn more about our business and smart solutions, and how we can revolutionize yours.
